comment: Hi , I m headed to Vegas aboard AA flight out of Dallas and my amazing carry on bag broke at the handle ! Any ideas for a quick fix to get me through ?
amr:
# ::snt Hi , I m headed to Vegas aboard AA flight out of Dallas and my amazing carry on bag broke at the handle ! Any ideas for a quick fix to get me through ?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hi
                  :mode expressive)
            :op2 (h2 / head-02
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (c / city
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Vegas"))
                  :manner (f / fly-01
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :manner (a2 / air)
                        :source (a3 / airport
                              :location (c2 / city
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Dallas")))))
            :op3 (b / break-01
                  :ARG1 (b2 / bag
                        :ARG1-of (c3 / carry-on-02)
                        :poss (ii2 / i)
                        :ARG0-of (a4 / amaze-01))
                  :location (h3 / handle)))
      :snt2 (ii3 / idea
            :mod (a5 / any)
            :purpose (f2 / fix-02
                  :ARG1-of (q / quick-02)
                  :ARG0-of (g / get-05
                        :ARG1 ii2
                        :ARG2 (t / through)))
            :polarity (a6 / amr-unknown)))
